Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
The following breed restrictions include dogs that are known to be aggressive towards strangers and / or children, or to be destructive in indoor environments. Pets that contain a mix of any of the breeds listed are not permitted. Restricted Pet Breeds include the following: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Bulldog, Doberman Pincher, Rottweiler, German Shepherd, Tosa Inu, Staffordshire Terrier (American or Bull), Bull Terrior, Mastiff, Bullmastiff, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Siberian Husky, Malamute, Wolf-Dog Hybrid, Great Dane, St. Bernard, Akita, Chow-Chow. 
* $250 Deposit
* $40 Monthly Pet Rent
* 2 Pet Limit

Description: Experience modern comfort at The Perry, a Park Potomac apartment community inspired by the surrounding environment and history. A gourmet destination just outside Washington, DC; where visitors and locals alike will travel for a taste of something different. The Perry is a standout building with thoughtfully selected décor, like hand-chosen fixtures, soothing colors, and a blend of comforting textures. Here, a balanced life is more than possible—it’s effortless.

Description:
Charming Dutch Colonial situated on half acre, within easy walking distance to Potomac Village. Enjoy the charm of an established neighborhood with all the amenities of a new home. This is one of Potomac’s prettiest streets in spring with Cherry Blossoms lined throughout. What makes this a sun filled, truly warm, and special home are:
? Renovated interiors: baths, new paint, kitchen, appliances, new fans and new lighting throughout.
? Sun filled all rooms
? Great backyard for children, parties, or private escapes
? Handsome hardwood floors throughout. Recently redone.
? Extra-wide driveway and two car garage
Within close proximity to Landon, Holton Arms, Montessori, French Lycee, German School, and a host of other private schools. One of the most convenient locations for accessing, Rockville, Bethesda, DC, and Tysons Corner, all within 10-30 mins, drive.
Main Level ………………………………………………………………………………...
? Spacious LIVING ROOM
? Separate FAMILY ROOM with fireplace and French doors to private deck.
? FULL STUDY/LIBRARY (Includes Library Shelves and computer desk)
? FULL BATH
? KITCHEN with stone tiles, stainless steel appliances, and granite counter tops.
? Separate DINING ROOM with Bay window overlooking the garden.
Upper Level………………………………………………………………………………..
? MASTER BEDROOM with FULL BATH and separate SITTING ROOM.
? Three Additional BEDROOMS
? ALL ROOMS Bathed in sunlight! And views of sky and trees.
? Full hall BATH
? LINEN CLOSET
Lower Level……………………………………………………………………………...
? BEDROOM and RECREATION ROOM. Completely Finished. 
? FULL BATH

Hardwood floor thru out. Fresh painted. Large living roomwith a fireplace. 4 Large Bedrooms. 2 Full Bath 1 HB 2 Car Garage. Walk to Hoover & Churchill schools. Minutes to shopping center Metro and Region Parks.

Description: Stately updated home on 2 ac lot steps from Potomac Village set BACK OFF MAIN RD. Features elegant finishes 4 fpls renovated BAs throughout updated systems. Main lvl boasts gourmet kit w/granite counters & stainless steel appl great rm w/fpl study w/wood builtins & sun rm w/walls of windows overlooking landscaped grounds w/organic garden deck fire pit 3 car gar

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: Fabulous Fox Hills home available for rent! Located on a cul-de-sac this 5BR home has space in the all right places! Great flow easy entertaining. Expanded DR will seat a crowd! Family room has a sunroom addition (3 season room) & a deck! Just off kitchen is the mud rm & laundry rm. Garage is 1.5 cars (the DR was expanded into the space) TONS of storage! completely finished LL w/workroom office

FR w/wet bar off TS kit with newer appliances Granite counters Stone fireplace perfect for Embassy personnel .minutes from DC and easy access to the beltway and I-270 Across from McLean School; Churchill HS cluster walk to Cabin John Shopping Center bus park.

Description:
(301) 233-6501 - Spectacular Custom End Unit Elevator Town House in River Quarry - 5BD/5.5BA - ** Award Winning Home built by Custom Home Builder, Carter Inc. ~ END UNIT LUXURY TH with all the incredible features you desire. Hardwood floors, granite countertops, stainless appliances, large and open concept living spaces. Top of the line property with nice rear patio, fenced in rear yard and elevator - all nestled in this lovely, gated & private community. Front-loading 2 car garage + guest parking. Lawn care included!! Close to Potomac, Bethesda, DC, VA, I-270, I-495 and so much more.
(RLNE3449294)

Description:
(202) 232-0600 - Spacious, sunny, classic colonial 4 bdrm 2.5 bath on one of the nicest lots in Ridgeleigh. - Main floor includes large living room, family room, dining room, and office. Eat-in kitchen is completely renovated with granite countertops, all new appliances and bay window with morning light. Upstairs includes 3 bedrooms plus new master suite with walk-in closet, two hanging closets, and master bath with double sink, soaking tub and oversized shower. Hall-bath, powder room, and mudroom all renovated. New windows and doors. Walk-out, above-ground basement adds 900 sf. Property backs to Cabin John Park. Member of Ridgeleigh Homeowners’ Association, a community of 100 homes with neighborhood parties and picnics for Halloween and summer. Churchill HS pyramid.
Non-refundable pet fee $500
(RLNE3421608) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - 4 Bed 3.5 Bath Townhouse in the Westlake Terrace Neighborhood of Bethesda - Enter this terrific townhouse off of a small porch into a formal foyer with coat closet and half bath. To the left of the foyer is an eat-in kitchen that comes equipped with an electric range, separate double wall ovens, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal along with lots of cabinet space. L-shaped living room/dining room (13x10)(17x15) is located at the back of the house and has hardwood floors. Stairs in foyer lead up to the second level. Master bedroom (17x15) includes hardwood floors, his/her closets and a full bath. Two additional bedrooms (13x12)(12x10) also have hardwood floors and share a hall bath. Finished basement includes a fourth bedroom (15x12) with hardwood floors, large family room (21x17) with hardwood floors and a wood burning fireplace, full bath and laundry room. Sliding glass doors in family room lead out onto a patio and the back yard that overlooks a lake. No Pets Please. To inquire, call or text WMS at 240-997-3585.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3383411) Other Amenities - Other- unassigned parking, community pool and tennis courts. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 620-8226 - River Quarry Townhouse Elegance - Luxury TH - 3875 Sq. Ft 4/4.5 - Exquisite finishes on this Luxury TH, 4 bedrooms, 4.5 Baths, 3 finished Levels, high ceilings, stone exterior, elevator and bedroom level laundry! Hardwood on main level, Granite & Stainless, Huge Rooms with loads of light, Huge Master Suite with Dual Walk-In Closets, two car garage, Custom Rear Patio. Located close in Bethesda with easy access to 495, 20 minutes to downtown DC, 14 minutes to Rockville or Tysons Corner!
(RLNE1939649) Other Amenities - Elevator in Building.

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
This nearly 4000 square foot house sits on a 88,000 square foot lot and features 4 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms with an in-ground swimming pool. The house icovers 3 levels with a finished basement.  This beautiful home has designer furnishings, ornate decorations from around the world and lots of character.  The house features a gourmet kitchen, a formal dining room and living room and a three car garage.  
Nearby schools include The Manor Montessori School, St Francis Episcopal Day School and Potomac Elementary School. The closest grocery stores are Safeway, Giant and Giant Food. Nearby coffee shops include Starbucks and PRFC Inc. Nearby restaurants include Renato at River Falls, Lock 72 Kitchen & Bar among many other dining spots.  Please note: This property has a six month minimum lease term.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: Custom Built Luxury TH in RIVER QUARRY - Spectacular close to DC VA MD - 3 finished levels w/ Elevator (hardwired phone line required for use). Hardwood Floors Gourmet Kitchen w/Granite Breakfast Bar & ENERGY STAR APPLIANCES. 2 car garage driveway. Fully finished basement w/full BR & BA. Large master en-suite. Bedroom level laundry. Rear deck & yard. Gated community. Churchill HS

Description: New master suite with walk-in closet and two hanging closets and master bath with double sink soaking tub and oversized shower. New eat-in kitchen with granite countertops all new appliances and bay window with morning light. Hall-bath powder room and mudroom all renovated. New windows and doors. Walk-out above-ground basement. Property backs to Cabin John Park. Member of Ridgeleigh HOA

Three bedrooms 2 bathrooms upstairs plus huge family room and extra bedroom and bathroom in lower level. Large laundry/ mud room fully fenced backyard with playground. Located right before a cul-de-sac in a secluded neighborhood. Nest thermostat.

Rear deck & yard. Gated community.

Description:
SENIOR APARTMENTS- AGES 62+! Victory Terrace brings new vision to Potomac, Maryland – an enhanced quality of life for seniors in moderately priced luxury rental apartment homes set in a serene wooded location, while convenient to nearby shopping centers and services. Our one and two bedroom floor plans feature a fully-equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, plush wall-to-wall carpeting and closet space galore with a pantry closet, walk-in closet and foyer closet. Victory Terrace offers pet-friendly senior apartment living at an affordable rent!
In addition to our beautiful apartment homes, our residents enjoy utilizing the variety of amenities provided at Victory Terrace. Exercise in our fitness center while you wait for your laundry to finish or email friends and family in the computer lab. Activities abound- there is never a dull moment at Victory Terrace. Enjoy social activities ranging from seasonal celebrations, wellness seminars and exciting events. Relax and unwind outside on the patio by the calming coy pond. You will also find a library and many common areas for relaxing with neighbors. Our dedicated onsite management team provides 24 hour emergency maintenance and excellent customer service. Ideally located in Montgomery County, Victory Terrace is convenient to major highways, I-270 and the Capital Beltway providing easy access to Rockville, Washington DC, Virginia and more! We are within close proximity to multiple bus stops and our community shuttle service plans monthly trips to local shopping centers and attractions. With convenience, accessibility and affordability, our award-winning senior community provides the best in retirement living in the DC Metro area! Call today to schedule a tour!

Dogs Allowed:
The following breed restrictions include dogs that are known to be aggressive towards strangers and / or children, or to be destructive in indoor environments. Pets that contain a mix of any of the breeds listed are not permitted. Restricted Pet Breeds include the following: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Bulldog, Doberman Pincher, Rottweiler, German Shepherd, Tosa Inu, Staffordshire Terrier (American or Bull), Bull Terrior, Mastiff, Bullmastiff, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Siberian Husky, Malamute, Wolf-Dog Hybrid, Great Dane, St. Bernard, Akita, Chow-Chow.
